content.prompt: During the 1950's many Western European countries experienced

choices.label: a significant rise in the unemployment rate
strict governmental controls over the size of families
a rapid increase in the birth rate
rising mortality rates due to deterioration in health care
acute poverty due to a series of food shortages

topic.text: 9.14: 20th- and 21st-Century Culture, Arts, and Demographic Trends

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
